content.rendered:
Directed by Anubhav Sinha.

Written by Gaurav Solanki.

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana(Ayan Ranjan). Nassar(CBI Officer Panikar (as Nasser)). Manoj Pahwa(Bhramadatt Singh). Kumud Mishra(Kisan Jatav). Isha Talwar(Aditi). Sayani Gupta(Gaura). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub(Nishad). Shubhrajyoti Barat(Chandrabhan). Sushil Pandey(Nihal Singh). Aakash Dabhade(Satyendra Rai). Ashish Verma(Mayank). Ronjini Chakraborty(Dr. Malti Ram). Veen(Anshu Naharia). Sumbul Touqeer(Amali (as Sumbul Touqueer)).Zia Ahmed Khan.Raju Pandey. Shikha Valmiki(Victim Girl Shanu). Isha Verma(Victim Girl Mamta). Suchi(Victim Girl Pooja). R.D. Singh(Subodh Lal). Uday Vir Singh Yadav(Sukkha Singh). Naman Shukla(Young Dalit Boy 1). Vikesh Bajpai(Young Dalit Boy 2). Ravi Singh(Young Dalit Boy 3). Vivek Yadav(Nokhai (as Vivek Kumar Yadav)). Ajay Pratap Singh(Orderly (Aayan’s House)). Varun Tamta(Mishra – Cop 1). Kapil Tilhari(Pramod Yadav – Cop 2). Noor Ahmed Tuba(Vijay Seth – Cop 3). Naval Shukla(Mahant (as Nawal Shukla)). Shivam Singh(Bachchu Rai). Tariq Iqbal(Dr. Awdhesh). Shreya Awasthi(Archana). Lajjawati Mishra(Old Lady at Tea Stall). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Anurag Bedi. Arvind Boodi. Amit J. Chaudhary. Arun Singh Dikky. Sagar Shirgaonkar. Anubhav Sinha. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Ruchir Tiwari.

Production Benaras Mediaworks. Zee Studios.
